verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1732>pass<s%>, when David <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H3427>Lo<s%>, I dwell in a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%>, but the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> dwelleth under <S%H3407>curtains<s%>.
And <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H6213>Do<s%> all that is in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>; for God is with <S%H430>thee<s%>.
And it came to pass the same <S%H3915>night<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came to <S%H5416>Nathan<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Go <S%H3212><s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Thou shalt not <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H1004>house<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>:

for I have not dwelt <S%H3427>in<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, but have gone from <S%H168>tent<s%> to <S%H168>tent<s%>, and from one tabernacle to <S%H4908>another<s%>.

In all places wherein I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> with all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H1696>spake<s%> I a <S%H1697>word<s%> with <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Why have ye not <S%H1129>built<s%> me a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%>?

Now therefore thus shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, I <S%H3947>took<s%> thee from the <S%H5116>sheepcote<s%>, from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, that thou shouldest be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

and I have been with thee whithersoever thou hast <S%H1980>gone<s%>, and have cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>thee<s%>; and I will make thee a <S%H8034>name<s%>, like unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the great <S%H1419>ones<s%> that are in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And I will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and will <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H7931>them<s%>, that they may dwell in their own <S%H7264>place<s%>, and be moved no <S%H1121>more<s%>; neither shall the children of <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H1086>waste<s%> them any <S%H3254>more<s%>, as at the <S%H7223>first<s%>,

and as from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and I will <S%H3665>subdue<s%> all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>. Moreover I <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H1129>build<s%> thee a <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H3117>pass<s%>, when thy days are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> that thou must <S%H3212>go<s%> to be with thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, that I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1121>thee<s%>, who shall be of thy sons; and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>.
He shall <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H1004>house<s%>, and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

I will be his <S%H1>father<s%>, and he shall be my <S%H1121>son<s%>: and I will not <S%H5493>take<s%> my <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H5493>him<s%>, as I took it from him that was before <S%H6440>thee<s%>;

but I will <S%H5975>settle<s%> him in my <S%H1004>house<s%> and in my <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
According to all these <S%H1697>words<s%>, and according to all this <S%H2377>vision<s%>, so did <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3427>in<s%>, and sat <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Who am <S%H3068>I<s%>, O Jehovah <S%H430>God<s%>, and what is my <S%H1004>house<s%>, that thou hast <S%H935>brought<s%> me thus <S%H1988>far<s%>?

And this was a small <S%H6994>thing<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; but thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> for a great while to <S%H7350>come<s%>, and hast <S%H7200>regarded<s%> me according to the <S%H8448>estate<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> of high <S%H4609>degree<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

What <S%H3254>can<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> say yet <S%H3254>more<s%> unto thee concerning the <S%H3519>honor<s%> which is done to thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>? for thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, for thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H3820>sake<s%>, and according to thine own heart, hast thou <S%H6213>wrought<s%> all this <S%H1420>greatness<s%>, to make <S%H3045>known<s%> all these great <S%H1420>things<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, there is none like <S%H430>thee<s%>, neither is there any God <S%H2108>besides<s%> <S%H8085>thee<s%>, according to all that we have heard with our <S%H241>ears<s%>.

And what <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> is like thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6299>redeem<s%> unto himself for a <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H7760>make<s%> thee a <S%H8034>name<s%> by <S%H1420>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H1644>things<s%>, in driving out <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, whom thou <S%H6299>redeemest<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>?

For thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> didst thou <S%H5414>make<s%> thine own <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>; and <S%H3068>thou<s%>, Jehovah, becamest their <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H3068>now<s%>, O Jehovah, let the <S%H1697>word<s%> that thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and concerning his <S%H1004>house<s%>, be <S%H539>established<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> as thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

And let thy <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H539>established<s%> and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, even a <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> before <S%H6440>thee<s%>.

For <S%H430>thou<s%>, O my God, hast <S%H1540>revealed<s%> to thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> that thou wilt <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house<s%>: therefore hath thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in his heart to <S%H6419>pray<s%> before <S%H6440>thee<s%>.
And <S%H3068>now<s%>, O Jehovah, thou art <S%H430>God<s%>, and hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> this <S%H2896>good<s%> thing unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>:

and now it hath <S%H2974>pleased<s%> thee to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that it may continue for <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>thee<s%>: for thou, O Jehovah, hast <S%H1288>blessed<s%>, and it is <S%H1288>blessed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
